get.summary: Get a list of offers count per filter

parameters.name: X-API-Key
parameters.description: Use Api key provided by Marketplace Catalog Team as a parameter provided in the header

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the REST API used for the request.

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: The search text, if no value provided, this filter is ignored. Such as searchQuery=red hat

parameters.name: publisherDisplayName
parameters.description: The search publisher name. Such as publisherDisplayName=red hat. If no value provided, this filter is ignored.

parameters.name: azureBenefit
parameters.description:
Define the search for only azure benefit eligible offers, if no value provided, this filter is ignored. Default: null. 
- `Eligible`: Eligible.
- `NotEligible`: Not Eligible.

parameters.name: publisherTypes
parameters.description:
Products that contains any of the given publisher types, If no value provided, this filter is ignored. Possible values: Microsoft, ThirdParty. Default: Microsoft. 
- `Microsoft`: Microsoft.
- `ThirdParty`: Third Party.

parameters.name: badges
parameters.description:
Products that contains any of the given badges. If no value provided, this filter is ignored. The following product badges are available: 
- `PreferredSolution`: Preferred Solution.
- `PowerBICertified`: power BI Certified.
- `AdditionalPurchaseRequirement`: Additional Purchase Requirement.

parameters.name: industryCloud
parameters.description:
Define the search for IndustryCloud offers. If no value provided, this filter is ignored. Default: NotApplicable. 
- `NotApplicable`: Not Applicable.
- `True`: True.
- `False`: False.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language to search, ISO 639-1 two-letter code, possible values - 'en,cs,de,es,fr,hu,it,ja,ko,nl,pl,pt-br,pt-pt,ru,sv,tr,zh-hans,zh-hant'

parameters.name: productTypes
parameters.description:
Products that contains any of the given product types, Such as 'VirtualMachine'. If no value provided, this filter is ignored.
- `AADApps`: Azure Active Directory Apps.
- `AzureApplication`: Azure Application.
- `AzureServices`: Azure Services.
- `ConsultingServices`: Consulting Services.
- `Container`: Container.
- `ContainerApps`: Container Apps.
- `CoreVirtualMachine`: Core Virtual Machine.
- `CosellOnly`: Cosell Only.
- `DevService`: Dev Service.
- `DynamicsBC`: Dynamics BC.
- `DynamicsCE`: Dynamics CE.
- `DynamicsOps`: Dynamics Ops.
- `IotEdgeModules`: Iot Edge Modules.
- `ManagedApplication`: Managed Application.
- `ManagedServices`: Managed Services.
- `None`: None.
- `Office365`: Office365.
- `PowerBI`: PowerBI.
- `PowerBIVisuals`: PowerBI Visuals.
- `SaaS`: SaaS.
- `SolutionTemplate`: Solution Template.
- `VirtualMachine`: Virtual Machine.
- `VisualStudioExtension`: Visual Studio Extension.

parameters.name: pricingTypes
parameters.description:
Products that contains any of the given pricing types. If no value provided, this filter is ignored. 
- `Byol`: The product has at least one plan that is bring your own license.
- `Free`: The product has at least one plan that is free of charge.
- `FreeTrial`: The product has at least one plan that is free trial.
- `Payg`: The product has at least one plan that is Pay as you go, usage based billing model.
- `RI`: The product has at least one plan that is Reserved Instance billing model.

parameters.name: industryIds
parameters.description: Products that contains any of the given Product industries, If no value provided, this filter is ignored. Possible values - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/marketplace-categories-industries#industries. Such as 'retailers'

parameters.name: operatingSystems
parameters.description: Products that contains any of the given operating systems, if none provided then filter is ignored, this is relevant for Virtual Machine product type only. Such as operatingSystems=windows,linux

parameters.name: hideKeys
parameters.description: Products that contains any of the given hideKeys for preview. Such as '22c6b3ae-1111-1111-1111-e7cbdc8569dd'. If no value provided, this filter is ignored.

parameters.name: categoryIds
parameters.description: Products that contains any of the given product categories, https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/marketplace-categories-industries#categories. Such as 'Productivity'. If no value provided, this filter is ignored.

parameters.name: market
parameters.description: Product sold market, Possible values - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/marketplace-geo-availability-currencies or 'All' for all markets. Such as 'US'

parameters.name: supportedProducts
parameters.description: Products that contains any of the given supported products. Such as 'CRM'. If no value provided, this filter is ignored.

parameters.name: applicableProducts
parameters.description: Products that contains any of the given M365 products applicable. Such as 'Office365'. If no value provided, this filter is ignored.

parameters.name: publisherIds
parameters.description: Products that contains any of the given publisher ids. Such as 'Microsoft'. If no value provided, this filter is ignored.

parameters.name: ratingBuckets
parameters.description:
Products that contains any of the given rating buckets. Such as 'Above1'. If no value provided, this filter is ignored. 
- `AboveOne`: Above One.
- `AboveTwo`: Above Two.
- `AboveThree`: Above Three.
- `AboveFour`: Above Four

parameters.name: vmArchitectureTypes
parameters.description:
Array of Virtual Machine image architecture types to search by, see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/generation-2: 
 - `X64Gen1`: X64 Generation 1.
 - `X64Gen2`: X64 Generation 2.
 - `Arm64`: Arm64 image architecture.

parameters.name: vmSecurityTypes
parameters.description:
Products that contains any of the given vm security types. Such as 'Trusted'. If no value provided, this filter is ignored. 
- `None`: None.
- `Trusted`: Trusted.
- `Confidential`: Confidential

parameters.name: publishingStage
parameters.description:
Audience. Default: Preview.
- `Preview`: Preview.
- `Public`: Public

parameters.name: facets
parameters.description:
Array facets to facet by, if none provided then no facets will return. Such as facets=PricingTypes,operatingSystems. 
- `ApplicableProducts`: Applicable Products.
- `CategoryIds`: Category Ids.
- `SupportedProducts`: Supported Products. 
- `PublisherId`: Publisher Id.
- `AzureBenefit`: Azure Benefit.
- `Badges`: Badges.
- `IndustryCloud`: Industry Cloud.
- `PublisherType`: Publisher Type.
- `ProductType`: Product Type.
- `OperatingSystems`: Operating Systems.
- `PricingTypes`: Pricing Types.
- `VmImageGenerations`: Vm Image Generations.
- `VmSecurityTypes`: Vm Security Types.
- `VmArchitectureTypes`: Vm Architecture Types.
- `RatingBuckets`: Rating Buckets.

200.description: Returns a list of offers count per filter

default.description:
Error Responses: 

 * 400 - In case request malformed.

 * 401 - In case of a missing or invalid api key header

 * 500 - In case internal error.

get.summary: Get a list of azure marketplace catalog offers and total count and facets

parameters.name: X-API-Key
parameters.description: Use Api key provided by Marketplace Catalog Team as a parameter provided in the header

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the REST API used for the request.

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: The search text, if no value provided, this filter is ignored. Such as searchQuery=red hat

parameters.name: publisherDisplayName
parameters.description: The search publisher name. Such as publisherDisplayName=red hat. If no value provided, this filter is ignored.

parameters.name: azureBenefit
parameters.description:
Define the search for only azure benefit eligible offers, if no value provided, this filter is ignored. Default: null. 
- `Eligible`: Eligible.
- `NotEligible`: Not Eligible.

parameters.name: publisherTypes
parameters.description:
Products that contains any of the given publisher types, If no value provided, this filter is ignored. Possible values: Microsoft, ThirdParty. Default: Microsoft. 
- `Microsoft`: Microsoft.
- `ThirdParty`: Third Party.

parameters.name: badges
parameters.description:
Products that contains any of the given badges. If no value provided, this filter is ignored. The following product badges are available: 
- `PreferredSolution`: Preferred Solution.
- `PowerBICertified`: power BI Certified.
- `AdditionalPurchaseRequirement`: Additional Purchase Requirement.

parameters.name: industryCloud
parameters.description:
Define the search for IndustryCloud offers. If no value provided, this filter is ignored. Default: NotApplicable. 
- `NotApplicable`: Not Applicable.
- `True`: True.
- `False`: False.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language to search, ISO 639-1 two-letter code, possible values - 'en,cs,de,es,fr,hu,it,ja,ko,nl,pl,pt-br,pt-pt,ru,sv,tr,zh-hans,zh-hant'

parameters.name: select
parameters.description:
Array of fields to return. Such as 'pricingTypes'. 
- `All`: All fields.
- `ApplicableProducts`: Applicable Products.
- `CategoryIds`: Category Ids.
- `Market`: Market.
- `SupportedProducts`: Supported Products.
- `HideKeys`: Hide Keys.
- `PublisherId`: Publisher Id.
- `CspStates`: Csp States.
- `DisplayName`: Display Name.
- `AzureBenefit`: Azure Benefit.
- `Badges`: Badges.
- `SmallIconUri`: Small Icon Uri.
- `MediumIconUri`: Medium Icon Uri.
- `LargeIconUri`: Large Icon Uri.
- `WideIconUri`: Wide Icon Uri.
- `IndustryCloud`: Industry Cloud.
- `PublisherType`: Publisher Type.
- `PublishingState`: Publishing State.
- `Language`: Language.
- `UniqueProductId`: Unique Product Id.
- `ProductType`: Product Type.
- `Plans`: Plans.
- `OperatingSystems`: Operating Systems.
- `PricingTypes`: Pricing Types.
- `PublisherDisplayName`: Publisher Display Name.
- `Summary`: Summary.
- `VmImageGenerations`: Vm Image Generations.
- `VmSecurityTypes`: Vm Security Types.
- `VmArchitectureTypes`: Vm Architecture Types.
- `Description`: Description.
- `RatingBuckets`: Rating Buckets.
- `RatingAverage`: Rating Average.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description:
Array of sort by fields to order by, if none provided then ordered by search score. For example, orderby=RatingCount  desc. 
- `RatingCount`: ratingCount (asc/desc).
- `LastModifiedDateTime`: lastModifiedDateTime (asc/desc).
- `RatingAverage`: RatingAverage (asc/desc).

parameters.name: productTypes
parameters.description:
Products that contains any of the given product types, Such as 'VirtualMachine'. If no value provided, this filter is ignored.
- `AADApps`: Azure Active Directory Apps.
- `AzureApplication`: Azure Application.
- `AzureServices`: Azure Services.
- `ConsultingServices`: Consulting Services.
- `Container`: Container.
- `ContainerApps`: Container Apps.
- `CoreVirtualMachine`: Core Virtual Machine.

- `VirtualMachine`: Virtual Machine.
- `VisualStudioExtension`: Visual Studio Extension.

parameters.name: ratingBuckets
parameters.description:
Products that contains any of the given rating buckets. Such as 'Above1'. If no value provided, this filter is ignored. 
- `AboveOne`: Above One.
- `AboveTwo`: Above Two.

- `AboveFour`: Above Four

parameters.name: vmArchitectureTypes
parameters.description:
Array of Virtual Machine image architecture types to search by, see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/generation-2: 
 - `X64Gen1`: X64 Generation 1.
 - `X64Gen2`: X64 Generation 2.

parameters.description:
Products that contains any of the given vm security types. Such as 'Trusted'. If no value provided, this filter is ignored.

- `Confidential`: Confidential

parameters.description:
Audience. Default: Preview.
- `Preview`: Preview.
- `Public`: Public

parameters.name: facets
parameters.description:
Array facets to facet by, if none provided then no facets will return. Such as facets=PricingTypes,operatingSystems.

- `CategoryIds`: Category Ids.
- `SupportedProducts`: Supported Products. 
- `PublisherId`: Publisher Id.
- `AzureBenefit`: Azure Benefit.
- `Badges`: Badges.
- `IndustryCloud`: Industry Cloud.
- `PublisherType`: Publisher Type.
- `ProductType`: Product Type.
- `OperatingSystems`: Operating Systems.
- `PricingTypes`: Pricing Types.
- `VmImageGenerations`: Vm Image Generations.
- `VmSecurityTypes`: Vm Security Types.
- `VmArchitectureTypes`: Vm Architecture Types.
- `RatingBuckets`: Rating Buckets.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of items to skip. Minimum: 0

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Number of items to return. Minimum: 0, Maximum: 50000, Default: 20.

200.description: Returns a list of Azure Marketplace catalog offers and total count and facets

default.description:
Error Responses: 

 * 400 - In case request malformed.

 * 401 - In case of a missing or invalid api key header

 * 500 - In case internal error.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the REST API used for the request.

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: The search text. Such as searchQuery=red hat. If no value provided, this filter is ignored.

parameters.name: publisherDisplayName
parameters.description: The search publisher name. Such as publisherDisplayName=red hat. If no value provided, this filter is ignored.

parameters.name: azureBenefit
parameters.description:
Define the search for only azure benefit eligible offers, if no value provided, this filter is ignored. Default: null.

- `AADApps`: Azure Active Directory Apps.

Products that contains any of the given pricing types. If no value provided, this filter is ignored. 
- `Byol`: The product has at least one plan that is bring your own license.
- `Free`: The product has at least one plan that is free of charge.

parameters.description: Products that contains any of the given Product industries, If no value provided, this filter is ignored. Possible values - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/marketplace-categories-industries#industries. Such as 'retailers'

parameters.name: operatingSystems
parameters.description: Products that contains any of the given operating systems, if none provided then filter is ignored, this is relevant for Virtual Machine product type only. Such as operatingSystems=windows,linux

parameters.name: categoryIds
parameters.description: Products that contains any of the given product categories, https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/marketplace-categories-industries#categories. Such as 'Productivity'. If no value provided, this filter is ignored.'

parameters.name: supportedProducts
parameters.description: Products that contains any of the given supported products. Such as 'CRM'. If no value provided, this filter is ignored.

parameters.name: applicableProducts
parameters.description: Products that contains any of the given M365 products applicable. Such as 'Office365'. If no value provided, this filter is ignored.

 - `X64Gen1`: X64 Generation 1.

- `None`: None.

parameters.description:
Suggestion types. 
- `WordSearch`: WordSearch.

parameters.name: top

parameters.name: select
parameters.description:
Array of fields to return. Such as 'displayText'. 
- `DisplayText`: Display text.
- `Id`: Id.
- `IconUrl`: Icon Url.
- `ProductType`: Product type.
- `LinkedAddInsTypes`: Linked AddIns types.

200.description: Returns a list of azure marketplace products suggestions and count

default.description:
Error Responses: 

 * 400 - In case request malformed.

 * 401 - In case of a missing or invalid api key header

 * 500 - In case internal error.

ErrorDetails.description: The search error response details object

code.description: The error code description. Such as code=InternalError

message.description: The error message. Such as message=Internal server error

AzureBenefit.description: Eligibility for Azure consumption commitment benefit (https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/marketplace/azure-consumption-commitment-benefit)

PublisherType.description: A value indicating whether this is a Microsoft or third party product

ProductType.description: The delivery method or deployment model

PublishingStage.description: The product publishing stage. Possible values are: Preview, Public

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of API search

categoryIds.description: Array of product categories, https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/marketplace-categories-industries#categories. Such as 'Productivity'

industryIds.description: List of industry IDs the item belongs to

azureBenefit.description:
Eligibility for Azure consumption commitment benefit (https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/marketplace/azure-consumption-commitment-benefit). Possible values: 
- `Eligible` - Product is eligible for Azure consumption commitment benefit
- `NotEligible` - Product is not eligible for Azure consumption commitment benefit

badges.description: The following product badges are available: preferredSolution, powerBICertified, AdditionalPurchaseRequirement

publisherType.description:
A value indicating whether this is a Microsoft or third party product. Possible values:
- `Microsoft` - Product is published by Microsoft (1st party product)
- `Third Party` - Product is published by Third Party Vendor

publishingStage.description:
Product publishing stage. Possible values:
- `Preview` - Product is available to restricted audience
- `Public` - Product is publicly available in the Marketplace

productType.description:
The delivery method or deployment model. Possible values:
- `SaaS` - The product is a Software solution purchased on pay-as-you-go basis from a cloud service provider
- `VirtualMachine` -  The product is Image service instances with usage-based pricing
- `AzureApplication` - Products published as Solution Templates (ST) or Azure Managed Apps (AMA) plans that deploy Azure resources to the customer tenant 
- `DynamicsCE` - All Dynamics products except for DynamicsBC and DynamicsOps
- `DynamicsBC` - Dynamics 365 business Central 
- `Container` -  The product is delivered as Container
- `DynamicsOps` - Dynamics 365 Operations Apps
- `None` - Product type returned for Azure Services, Container Extensions and VM extensions
- `IotEdgeModules` - Resource is delivered as IoT Edge Module
- `ContainerApps` - Resource is delivered as Container App
- `ConsultingServices` Consulting Services (available only in Azure Marketplace as listing offers)
- `ManagedServices` - The product is delivered as Managed Service
- `PowerBI` - Power BI products
- `CosellOnly` - Products available in scope of Co-Sell program only
- `PowerBIVisuals` - Power BI Visuals products
- `Office365` - Office 365 products
- `DevService` - Dev Service
- `AADApps` - Azure Active Directory Applications
- `VisualStudioExtension` - Visual Studio Extensions

operatingSystems.description: Operating system info for this product

pricingTypes.description:
The list of the pricing types for which this offer is designated. Possible Values: 
- `Free` - Product has at least one plan that is free of charge.
- `FreeTrial` - Product has at least one plan that is free trial.
- `Byol` - Product has at least one plan that is bring your own license.
- `Payg` - Product has at least one plan that is Pay as you go, usage based billing model.
- `Ri` - Product has at least one plan that is Reserved Instance billing model.

smallIconUri.description: URI to the small product icon

ratingBuckets.description: Rating buckets, Above1, Above2, Above3, Above4

ratingCount.description: Total number of ratings for the offer

startingPrice.description: Retail price of the product's cheapest plan

plans.description: List of plans that are available for this product

supportedProducts.description: Maps to the list of compatible products that the publisher provides

applicableProducts.description: Product categories the offer belongs to

lastModifiedDateTime.description: Latest update date of the product

MarketStartPrice.description: Retail price of the product's cheapest plan

market.description: The market for which the starting price is calculated

uniquePlanId.description: Unique plan Id which is prefixed by combining uniqueProductId and PlanId with no separator in between

vmArchitectureType.description:
VM Architecture Type. Applicable to Virtual Machine products only. PossibleValues:
- `Arm64` - The VM image architecture of the plan is Arm64
- `X64Gen1` - The VM image architecture of the plan is X64 Generation1
- `X64Gen2` - The VM image architecture of the plan is X64 Generation2

cspState.description: A value indicating whether the product is available for purchase through CSP channel

hasProtectedArtifacts.description: Set to true if plan has artifacts that are to be hidden for non authenticated users

pricingTypes.description: The list of the pricing types for which this plan is designated (Possible values are the same as at product level)

vmSecurityTypes.description:
VM security type. Applicable to Virtual Machine products only. Possible values:
- Standard - Basic level of security for the virtual machine
- Trusted - protects against persistent and advanced attacks on Gen2 virtual machines with configurable features like security boot and virtual Trusted Platform Module(vTPM)
- Confidential - on top of Trusted Launch, Confidential virtual machines offer higher confidentiality and integrity guaranteed with hardware-based trusted execution environment

planType.description:
Managed Application or Solution template plan type (applicable only to Azure Applications product). Possible values: 
- `SolutionTemplate` - Solution Template plan type (applicable to Azure Applications only)
- `ManagedApplication` - Managed Application plan type (applicable to Azure Applications only)

displayRank.description: The order the plan is displayed in the 'Plans' table (as configured by the publisher)

isPrivate.description: Indication that the plan is accessible to restricted audience only

CspState.description: Value showing whether the plan is available for purchase through CSP channel. For more information see, https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/cloud-solution-providers

generation.description: The VM image generation (applicable to Virtual Machine products only).see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/generation-2

altStackReference.description: Pointing to a planId which holds the alternative stack reference

relatedSkus.description: Pointing to a planId of plan related to this plan
